question: The IIT Alumni Council is setting up the world's largest molecular diagnostic lab in which city?
explanation:
The IIT Alumni Council is setting up the world's largest molecular diagnostic lab in Mumbai, Maharashtra named 'MegaLab Mumbai'.
Recently, the council has partnered with a CSIR-Institute of Genomics and Integrative Biology (CSIR-IGIB), to conduct research on spread of COVID-19 and patient data analysis. The IIT Alumni Council is the largest association of alumni, students and teachers from all the 23 IITs and partnering technical institutes.
